I got this dress to wear to a spring fundraiser and received so many compliments! I cannot believe what a great deal it is. The fabric feels nice and it fits perfectly. I really liked the length and how elegant the dress looks. I love it so much, I think I may get it in other colors as well.

I ordered the blue one and the color is so vibrant and the feel of the dress is so smooth & soft. It fits really well & true to size and is very comfortable. The neckline design is just okay, but all the other elements of this dress make up for where the style/design of that tie thing lack imo. Still very cute and I feel sooo good in it.
Delivered on time

This dress is beautiful, flattering, and true to size. I am 5'2'' and 170 pounds (typically wear size 12 in dresses) and was deciding between an L or XL. I ended up getting the L, and it fit comfortably. I was worried that the skirt would be too short, but it ended up being just the right length for my height (I am short though, so significantly taller gals might want to wear tights.)

Bought this for my oldest daughter for a baby shower we are attending as they want the guests to wear something pink and floral.  Both my daughter's loved it so will be ordering another one for my youngest to have for another occasion such as brunch with friends.

I was excited to see and receive it after I read all the good reviews. When it arrived, I felt “okay”. When I put it on, it feels snug a little bit and the size of the sleeves were kind of short. I wasnt able to return it as I needed it that weekend already.

I hate dresses and am never comfortable in them. This one was actually pretty cute! I bought the black one because I was attending a baptism in the fall. I’m 5’5” and purchased both the small and medium to compare. I have a wide ribcage so medium fit best, which is what I kept. It was maybe a touch wide in the skirt but small would have been tight and too short. The fabric and tiering hid my lower belly pooch and I didn’t have to wear any shapewear! Bonus! Paired with some booties and a denim jacket, this was super cute and comfy.

The sleeves are a bit long and the waist is looser on me than I would have liked. I would say it fits more like how an s normally fits me, I got it in xs which is my usual size. If you're petite, especially with shorter limbs and a narrow waist, I would suggest to size down if possible. The bust and hips are roomy. I love this dress so much. I feel like it would flatter a lot of different body types. The fabric is lightweight and the print is lovely.

评论概述: Pretty and floaty and feminine and SO FLATTERING
评论详情: Friends, this dress is ah-MA-zing.  I can never find dresses that fit both my top and bottom half, but feeling brave (glass of wine in-hand), I decided to give this one a try. I am SO GLAD I did.  It is adorable floaty and feminine and fun and SO FLATTERING.I was worried about it being see-through, but the double fabric makes it so that it’s not too sheer.  So far I’ve only worn it around the house, but I want to wear it everywhere.  You can dress it up with heels (I am thinking of buying another colour and wearing it to a wedding), or dress it down with sandals.  Oh my gosh it’s so cute.For reference, I’m 5’6” and 120 lbs/athletic body shape and the XS (which is what I’d normally choose) fit me perfectly.
